titleStmt.title: A defence of the principles of love, which are necessary to the unity and concord of Christians and are delivered in a book called The cure of church-divisions ... / by Richard Baxter ...
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

notesStmt.note: An answer to Edward Bagshaw's "An antidote against Mr. Baxter's palliated Cure of church-divisions." Cf. Matthews, A.G. Works of Richard Baxter, 1932, p. 26.

Pt. 1 has special t.p. with title: The general part or introduction to the defence of my Cure of church-divisions. Pt. 2 has caption title: An answer to the untrue and unjust exceptions of the antidote against my treatise for love and unity.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
